sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import Cookies from "universal-cookie"; import Api from "../../api"; import { Header, Icon, Container, Button, Modal, Label, Accordion, Grid, Segment, Transition, Form, Radio, Card, Table } from "semantic-ui-react"; import ServiceHandler from "../Sections/ServiceHandler"; const api = new Api(); const cookies = new Cookies(); class AllStatusViewer extends Component { state = { group: this.props.group, environment: cookies.get("userEnv"), core: "", coreEventConsumer: "", mpkg: "", dependencies: "", reverseproxy: "", storage: "", loaded: false }; triggerResponse = res => { console.log(res); if (res && res.status === 200) { this.setState({ core: res.data.data.core, coreEventConsumer: res.data.data.coreEventConsumer, mpkg: res.data.data.mpkg, dependencies: res.data.data.dependencies, reverseproxy: res.data.data.reverseproxy, storage: res.data.data.storage, loaded: true }); } }; genericSetter = data => { const content = []; for (let x in data) { let rowTitle = ( {data[x].name} {data[x].status} ); content.push(rowTitle); } return ( Service Name Status Handlers {content.map((value, ind) => ( {value} ))}
); }; render() { return (
Application Status
Core
Core Group
Middle {/*
Core Group
*/} {/* Group Name Handlers Core
*/} {this.state.loaded && this.genericSetter(this.state.core)} {this.state.loaded && this.genericSetter(this.state.coreEventConsumer)} {this.state.loaded && this.genericSetter(this.state.dependencies)} {this.state.loaded && this.genericSetter(this.state.reverseproxy)} {this.state.loaded && this.genericSetter(this.state.storage)}
Custom
{this.state.loaded && this.genericSetter(this.state.mpkg)}
); } componentWillMount() { api.trigger(this.state.environment, "status", this.triggerResponse); } } export default AllStatusViewer;
